entries.title: U.S. Sent “Weather” Balloons to Spy on China and the Soviet Union in the 1950s
entries.description:
When caught, the Eisenhower administration lied through its teeth about it.

The post U.S. Sent “Weather” Balloons to Spy on China and the Soviet Union in the 1950s appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Biden Pledged to Reverse Trump's Weak Gun Export Rules — but Instead Did Nothing
entries.description:
In his State of the Union speech, Biden is expected to address the U.S. gun violence crisis — but not the gun crisis it exports to foreign countries.

The post Biden Pledged to Reverse Trump’s Weak Gun Export Rules — but Instead Did Nothing appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: The FBI Paid a Violent Felon to Infiltrate Denver's Racial Justice Movement
entries.description:
Mickey Windecker encouraged violence, accused activist leaders of being police cooperators, and tried to draw demonstrators into elaborate stings.

The post The FBI Paid a Violent Felon to Infiltrate Denver’s Racial Justice Movement appeared first on The Intercept.
